msg.msgText: The values of configuration items of "ConnectionPolicy" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command. imaserver show ConnectionPolicy help imaserver show ConnectionPolicy "Name=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver show ConnectionPolicy "Name=ConnPol1" The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
